subject: UNITED BANK OF AFRICA (UBA)
body:
UNITED BANK OF AFRICA (UBA)
36 Queen St, London EC4R 1BN, United Kingdom
Immediate release of your funds for a value of  1.5M
Our reference 320/725/NWl
We need to confirm from you if UBA group has credited your account
with the approved Amount One Million Five Hundred Thousand United
States Dollars as directed by the United nation, The UN has instructed
the immediate release of fund to all beneficiary who has an
outstanding payment from the Executed contract, Lotteries and other
fund to collect, this instruction came after the meeting with the head
of states and other governmental organization on the need to settle
outstanding beneficiary in the 72nd regular section of the Economic
Community  meeting that was convened at the Headquarters in United
States
We will be obliged to confirm from you if you have received your
payment from UBA group bank to enable us close your file and put our
record straight, however if you have not received your payment , you
are advice to contact bank through this email:
customerservice@ubabankgroup.org
 to enable us finalize the obligation
holding your fund thereby releasing your payment to you without any
further delay.
We Look Forward To Serving You Better.
John Coulter
Executive Director United bank of Africa UBA

subject: Re:   UNITED BANK OF AFRICA (UBA)
body:
Dear John Coulter,

I am writing to inform you that I have not yet received the payment of One Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars as directed by the United Nations. 

Could you please provide me with more information on how to proceed in order to finalize this transaction? 

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Antony
